citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
On 3-12-14 at 11:15 AM, a facility representative was not available in order to conduct an Animal Welfare Act
inspection. Licensee was reached by phone, but stated no one would be available for at least four hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
On 3-12-14 at 11:15 AM, a facility representative was not available in order to conduct an Animal Welfare Act
inspection.  Licensee was reached by phone, but stated no one would be available for at least four hours.
